name: Manhattan Beach
shortDescription: A stylish coastal city known for its sandy beaches, vibrant downtown, and active outdoor lifestyle.
fullDescription: Manhattan Beach is a picturesque seaside community famous for its wide sandy beaches, scenic pier, and a lively downtown area filled with boutique shops, restaurants, and cafes. The city offers excellent schools, a family-friendly environment, and numerous recreational opportunities including volleyball, surfing, and biking along The Strand. Close to Los Angeles, it blends a relaxed beach vibe with sophisticated urban amenities, making it a desirable location for residents and visitors alike.
heroImageAlt: Sunset view of Manhattan Beach with people walking on the pier

neighborhoods.name: Hermosa Beach
neighborhoods.description: Neighboring beach city known for its lively pier, nightlife, and surf culture.

neighborhoods.name: Redondo Beach
neighborhoods.description: Coastal city featuring a marina, pier, and family-friendly attractions.

neighborhoods.name: El Segundo
neighborhoods.description: Small city known for its aerospace industry and beach access.

neighborhoods.name: Torrance
neighborhoods.description: Diverse city with parks, shopping centers, and coastal neighborhoods.

highlights.title: Manhattan Beach Pier
highlights.description: Iconic pier with an aquarium, fishing spots, and scenic ocean views.

highlights.title: The Strand
highlights.description: A popular beachfront path for walking, biking, and rollerblading along the coast.
highlights.bgImageAlt: People biking along The Strand beach path

highlights.title: Downtown Manhattan Beach
highlights.description: Walkable area with boutiques, cafes, restaurants, and lively events.
highlights.bgImageAlt: Downtown Manhattan Beach street with shops and people

highlights.title: Sand Dune Park
highlights.description: Family-friendly park with large sand dunes, playgrounds, and picnic areas.
highlights.bgImageAlt: Sand dunes and children playing in the park

faqs.question: What makes Manhattan Beach unique?
faqs.answer: Its iconic pier, beautiful beaches, and vibrant downtown create a charming coastal lifestyle.

faqs.question: How is the real estate market in Manhattan Beach?
faqs.answer: Manhattan Beach has a competitive market featuring luxury homes near the beach and downtown area.

faqs.question: What activities are popular in Manhattan Beach?
faqs.answer: Surfing, beach volleyball, biking The Strand, and enjoying dining and shopping downtown are popular activities.

faqs.question: Is Manhattan Beach easy to commute from?
faqs.answer: It has good access to major freeways and public transit, making commuting to Los Angeles convenient.
